content: heel to the live sts toe round 1 *k1 ssk k to last 3 heel sts k2tog k1* repeat between ** over instep sts 4 sts decrease round 2 k all sts repeat rnds 1-2 8 8 10 10 10 more times until 4 6 6 8 10 sts remain for heel and 4 6 6 8 10 for instep - 8 12 12 16 20 sts total break yarn leaving an 12 tail if using dpns place instep stitches on one needle and heel stitches on one needle graft instep and heel sts together using kitchener stitch finishing weave in ends and block to measurements ttoopp ddoowwnn ssoocckkss 55
